comments.body: question: are we planning to run the benchmarks in any other browser soon (meaning in a few quarters) if so I will strongly argue that we should abstract the browser related dependencies to another class. It took a while to make felt modular for example. This time we should start with a flexible code from the start :)
In the short-term - Q1-Q2 - the plan is to only run on Chrome. However, when we are ready to add more browsers, I think we should find a way to share code with `felt`.
